BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Mute stdio for runNpmInstall by default (#338) Output logs if error occurs

COMMIT.MESSAGE: [now-build-utils] Create zip files with symlinks properly (#388) After #359, creating zip files with symlinks would be corrupted because the "target" of the symlink was actually the file contents. This commit fixes the zip file construction logic to handle symlinks by placing the target of the symlink as the "contents" of the file in the zip. The unit test relies on GNU `unzip` and checks that it creates the symlink from the produced zip file as expected.
